headline: Mastercard Incorporated (MA) Launches Mastercard Agent Pay in Collaboration With Stripe, Google, and Ant International’s Antom
summary: With significant upside potential, Mastercard Incorporated (NYSE:MA) secures a spot on our list of the Top 15 Stocks to Buy in 11 Different Sectors for the Next 3 Months. On September 10, 2025, Mastercard Incorporated (NYSE:MA) announced a major push toward AI-powered payments, signaling a shift in digital commerce. headline: Visa vs. Mastercard: Which Payments Giant is the Smarter Buy Today?

headline: Visa's Value-Added Services: Driving Growth or Cosmetic?
summary: V's value-added services rise 26% y/y in Q3 FY25, boosting growth with AI-driven fraud tools, new partnerships and faster checkouts.

headline: AgriFORCE Growing Systems (AGRI) to Launch as First Publicly-Traded Avalanche-Focused Company on NASDAQ with a $550 Million Capital Raise Strategy
summary: AgriFORCE Growing Systems Ltd. (Nasdaq: AGRI) today announced it will be renamed AVAX One (the "Company") and plans to raise approximately $550 million, establishing the first NASDAQ-listed company with a dedicated strategy to maximize ownership of AVAX, the native token of the Avalanche network.

headline: India’s Pine Labs eyes up to $700m in IPO – report
summary: The fundraising target was decreased from a previous goal of $1bn after some current shareholders decided to reduce the size of their stake in the offer for sale.
